mentor.name: Haris Smajlović
mentor.organization: BIDS department @ Yale School of Medicine
mentor.bio:
Haris is a Postdoctoral Associate at the Hoon Cho Lab at the BIDS department of Yale School of Medicine. Previously, he was a Ph.D. student at the 0xTCG lab at the University of Victoria, Canada, under the supervision of prof. Ibrahim Numanagić. Before that, he was a lecturer at the Department of Mathematics of the University of Sarajevo and a lead software engineer at Symphony.is. He graduated from the Faculty of Mathematics and Natural Sciences of the University of Sarajevo, under the supervision of prof. Adis Alihodžić.
He is interested in privacy-enhancing technologies, programming languages, and securing biomedical workflows.
